channel.title: Making Java JDK 6 u3 Reconized by windows
channel.description: Iv only found ones for the U2 version, and so i switch it to U3 and try, but it wont work, could somone help me?

item.title: Making Java JDK 6 u3 Reconized by windows
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:

Thank you! that did help

item.title: Making Java JDK 6 u3 Reconized by windows
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok once you have downloaded jdk u3 now go to your veriables if you had jdk u2 you go to each one then edit and change the class path CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.;

and put CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.;

now erase the path C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin

and add C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

that should do to to check go to start menu>run>type cmd>then a black screen comes up type javac and a bunch of words should come up =)

Read full topic
item.source: Making Java JDK 6 u3 Reconized by windows
